company.name: Mundi
company.description: Mundi is a modern travel agency that connects people with unique experiences around the world. We offer flights, hotels, packages, rentals, and personalized assistance, with the commitment to make your trip easier, more accessible, and safer.
company.slogan: Your world, just a click away

customer_service.hours: Monday to Friday from 10 AM to 9 PM / Saturdays from 10 AM to 4 PM

sales.hours: Monday to Sunday and holidays from 9 AM to 11 PM

franchises.message: I want to become a franchise!

consumer_defense.description: Consumer protection. To file a complaint, click here.
consumer_defense.general_address: General Directorate of Consumer Defense and Protection - Buenos Aires City

copyright.text: Copyright Â© 2025 Mundi. All rights reserved.
copyright.data_notice: The Agency for Access to Public Information, as the Control Authority of Law No. 25.326, is empowered to handle complaints and claims filed by individuals whose rights are affected by non-compliance with current personal data protection regulations.
